[SmallWeb](https://smallweb.net "SmallWeb") is looking to expand by acquiring other hosting companies and/or their clients. If you're looking for a dignified exit strategy whilst doing the best for your customers this might just be for you.

Here's a couple of reasons why SmallWeb could be the perfect home for your clients.

- We have servers pretty much globally in UK/US/EU/AU/AS.
- We care about your clients more than their money. I don't claim to be perfect but I always try my best and put as much effort in to help a customer out or to customise to their individual needs.


Maybe you started recently and your long-term plans have changed. Luckily, mine haven't.
I plan to be active in 5, 10 and 20+ years and hopefully your customers will stick around with me so we can all grow old together while saving money on our hosting.

What I'm looking for:
- Webhosting businesses/clientele. No server hosting.
- DirectAdmin/cPanel based customers only.
- £10,000 or less annual revenue.

Please send an email to discuss further at acquisitions @ smallweb.net
